metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23566 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: The package nanoid from 3.0.0 and before 3.1.31 are vulnerable to Information Exposure via the valueOf() function which allows to reproduce the last id generated.

notes.Note: alexmurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 19.10, the chromium-browser package is just a script that installs the Chromium snap no indication chromium-browser is vulnerable to this issue

criterions.comment: node-mocha package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
node-postcss package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
